backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all data types (WorkerProfile, EmployerProfile, JobPosting, etc.), state management with Maps, and public functions for user profiles, worker/employer registration, job posting, matching, attendance, payments, and ratings with role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including worker/employer authentication, QR code generation, job posting system, job discovery, and their associated files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend components and pages describing their purpose, including registration forms, dashboards, navigation, QR code display, and role selection with implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, borders, and sidebar elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for landing page, role selection, worker/employer registration and profiles, job management, attendance scanning, work history, and wallet functionality.
frontend/src/components/ExperienceLevelB: Reusable badge component displaying worker experience level (novice, intermediate, expert) with color-coded styling, icons, and year ranges.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper component with Navigation header, main content area, and footer containing platform info, quick links, social media icons, and Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Main navigation component with responsive menu, authentication controls, and role-based navigation links for workers (jobs, profile, history, wallet) and employers (dashboard, jobs, workers, wallet). Includes mobile menu toggle and admin panel access.
frontend/src/components/ReliabilityScore: Displays a worker's reliability score (0-5) with color-coded badge (green/yellow/red) and label (Excellent/Good/Needs Improvement) based on score thresholds.
frontend/src/components/SkillsMultiSelec: Multi-select checkbox component for choosing construction skills (masonry, plumbing, electrician, carpentry, painting, roofing, flooring, tiling, welding, general labor) with grid layout.
frontend/src/components/UserRoleSelector: Onboarding component for new users to enter their name and select role (worker or employer), then navigates to appropriate registration flow based on selection.
frontend/src/components/WorkerQRCode.tsx: Generates and displays a QR code for a worker ID using the qrcode.js library loaded from CDN, with the worker ID displayed below the code.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, initializes access control with admin token, and invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options for idle handling and identity provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, worker profiles, employer profiles, job postings, candidate matching, payments, and system metrics with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for light/dark theme colors, plus base styles for typography and accessibility (minimum touch target sizes).
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AttendanceScanner.tsx: QR code scanner page for employers to check workers in/out of jobs, featuring live video scanning, job selection, and a dialog to confirm attendance actions.
frontend/src/pages/CreateJobPosting.tsx: Form page for employers to create new job postings with fields for skills, wage, duration, location (with geolocation support), shift timing, worker count, and job description.
frontend/src/pages/EmployerDashboard.tsx: Dashboard overview for employers showing key metrics (total jobs, active jobs, total workers, completion rate) and recent activity from their job postings.
frontend/src/pages/EmployerJobList.tsx: Lists all job postings created by the employer with details like skills, wage, duration, worker count, and location, plus navigation to create new jobs or view job details.
frontend/src/pages/EmployerProfile.tsx: Displays employer company profile information including company name, type, contact person, mobile number, and coordinates with option to create profile if none exists.
Employer registration form that collects company details (name, contact, type, location) and saves an employer profile. Uses geolocation API for coordinates and redirects to employer dashboard on success.
frontend/src/pages/JobDiscovery.tsx: Displays a list of available job postings filtered by completion status and worker capacity. Shows job details including skills, wage, duration, positions, and shift timing in card format.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero section and feature cards. Handles Internet Identity login and redirects authenticated users to role-specific dashboards (worker/employer) or role selection.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerProfile.tsx: Worker profile view showing personal details, skills, experience level, wage range, and availability toggle. Includes QR code component and reliability/experience badges.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerRegistration.ts: Worker registration form collecting mobile number, skills (multi-select), experience level, wage range, and location coordinates. Creates worker profile and redirects to profile page on success.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerWallet.tsx: Worker wallet page displaying total earnings, pending payments, and payment history with job details and payment status badges.
frontend/src/pages/WorkHistory.tsx: Displays worker's attendance records and job completion summary including total jobs, attendance count, and rating. Shows check-in/check-out times for each work record.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH, typography, container queries, animations, and design tokens for the UI component system.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining IEE workforce platform architecture, features, known limitations (no mobile app, external integrations, or payment processing), and image requirements.
